title: X-Factor Vol. 1 (Trade Paperback)
description: Change is coming. A new breed of man has emerged: Homo superior, individuals gifted by genetics with strange super-powers. But in a world that hates and fears mutants, it's not safe to stray from the norm. Known offenders are ostracized from society - in some cases beaten, hanged and crucified. Where will it end? Two federal agents - haunted by their own inner ghosts -- investigate the mutant phenomenon in a story that combines the drama of "Mississippi Burning" with the weird chills of "X-Files." Collects the four-issue mini-series!
